name: maria
personality: Highly dedicated and diligent, always strives to complete tasks efficiently and on time. Pays close attention to detail, is proactive in solving problems, and consistently goes above and beyond to support the team. Maintains a positive attitude under pressure and values professionalism and reliability in the workplace.

thought_process.thought: Need to review my notes and prepare an agenda for the meeting with my boss.
thought_process.reason: It's important to be well-prepared for the meeting to make it efficient and productive.
